numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I do not want the upper classes to get better education than the lower classes.
2. I do not want the upper classes to get better privileges than the lower classes.
3. The lower classes also need good education.
4. A country thrives depending on how the people are educated.
5. A country thrives depending on how well the people have done in college.
6. College is a big and important gap in people's lives.
7. A person's whole life is based on which college the person went to.
8. A person's whole life is based on how the person did in college.
9. I do not want people to do badly because they lack money.
10. I think that it does not cost colleges much to enroll a student in their education system.
